con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://itq.edu/soa/credit" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:mime="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/mime/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:tns="http://itq.edu/soa/credit"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://itq.edu/soa/credit" elementFormDefault="qualified"> <xs:include schemaLocation="credit.xsd"/> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="CreditRequest"> <wsdl:part name="parameter" element="tns:creditRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CreditResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameter" element="tns:creditResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="CreditPortType"> <wsdl:operation name="CreditOperation"> <wsdl:input message="tns:CreditRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:CreditResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="CreditBinding" type="tns:CreditPortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="CreditOperation"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://itq.edu/factura/generarCredito"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="CreditService"> <wsdl:port name="CreditPort" binding="tns:CreditBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8088/generarCredito"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://itq.edu/soa/credit" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="creditRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="nombres"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="([A-Za-z]+[\s]*)+"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="apellidoPaterno"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Za-z]+"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="apellidoMaterno"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Za-z]+"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="curp"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z][A,E,I,O,U,X][A-Z]{2}[0-9]{2}[0-1][0-9][0-3][0-9][M,H][A-Z]{2}[B,C,D,F,G,H,J,K,L,M,N,Ã‘,P,Q,R,S,T,V,W,X,Y,Z]{3}[0-9,A-Z][0-9]"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="domicilio" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="salario" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element name="monto" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element name="tasaInteres" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element name="plazo" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="creditResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="autorizado" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cred="http://itq.edu/soa/credit">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <cred:creditRequest>\r <cred:nombres>Luis Gerardo</cred:nombres>\r <cred:apellidoPaterno>Gomez</cred:apellidoPaterno>\r <cred:apellidoMaterno>Chavez</cred:apellidoMaterno>\r <cred:curp>VEGA780615HDFLML08</cred:curp>\r <cred:domicilio>vista bonita #109 col. villa del sol</cred:domicilio>\r <cred:salario>15000</cred:salario>\r <cred:monto>300000</cred:monto>\r <cred:tasaInteres>7</cred:tasaInteres>\r <cred:plazo>48</cred:plazo>\r </cred:creditRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
